comments.raw_text:
People have often asked us for something like WSDL for our WebServices, but of course we don't support SOAP, so WSDL doesn't apply to us. Google has something for their APIs that could possibly function as a service description, though:

  https://code.google.com/apis/discovery/

I believe there are also proposals for other service description standards based around JSON-RPC, but I'm not sure how popular they are yet.
